title: Natural Herbs for Seasonal Allergy
cleaned_text:
When the body responds to the foreign materials and show reactions, it is known as Allergy. These foreign materials are known as Allergens. This hypersensitivity of the body towards the allergens is known as Allergy. An imbalance occurs in the body of the individuals, when the body gets exposed to the allergens. This imbalance is basically the disturbance caused due to the Kapha element. This is followed by congestion and allergic reactions. The Ayurvedic cause of allergic reactions is the unbalance among the tri-doshas, Pitta, Kapha and Vata.

To get rid of the allergic reactions, the patient must follow a strict recommended diet.

The patient must include peas, broccoli, carrots, cauliflower and French beans in their diet. Light home made food is recommended. Also, pulses and cereals must also be consumed on a regular basis. One must ensure to have fat free diet only. Also, the patient must exclude dairy items, greasy food, nut, rice, yogurt, meat and citrus fruits from their regular diet. These materials excite the immune system of the individuals, which lead to various allergic responses.
• Pouring the saline sprays in the nostrils to clear off the nasal passage completely.
• HEPA filter and dehumidifiers must be used to filter the dust and dirt and get rid of moisture and pollution.
• Inhalation of steam is yet another recommended healthy tip to get rid of allergies.
• The essential tip to prevent allergies is to avoid the allergens as much as possible.
